contents:
Your Result: Social Democrat
 
82%
Social democracy is a political ideology that espouses economic and social policies that promote social equality and justice. Economically, social democrats support capitalism with state intervention while also supporting the nationalization of critical industries. However, many social democrats support corporatism. Socially, social democrats tend to be socially permissive, supporting liberal causes such as same-sex marriage and abortion rights.
